meanings.definition: Used as an intensifier to emphasize the extreme nature of something.
meanings.sent1: She ran the goddamnedest fastest in the race.
meanings.sent2: He tried his goddamnedest to fix the broken toy.
meanings.sent3: The cat made the goddamnedest leap onto the table.
meanings.sent4: The storm was the goddamnedest fiercest we had ever seen.
meanings.sent5: The sunsets here are the goddamnedest most beautiful in the world.

meanings.definition: Used to express frustration or annoyance.
meanings.sent1: Goddamnedest! I spilled my drink again.
meanings.sent2: Well, that was the goddamnedest thing I've ever heard.
meanings.sent3: Goddamnedest, I forgot my keys inside the house.
meanings.sent4: The traffic was the goddamnedest slow today.
meanings.sent5: Goddamnedest, why does this always happen to me?
